course.title: MAT 3379 Introduction to Time Series Analysis (3 units)
course.desc: Time domain methods: detrending, autoregressive moving average (ARMA) models, non stationarity and seasonality, state space methodology. Frequency domain methods: lagged regression, deterministic input and random coefficient models. Examples of financial time series. Time series data will be analyzed using software packages.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 2371, (MAT 2375 or MAT 2378 or MAT 2379).
